channel.title: Posts on Yani Trevino
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Yani Trevino

item.title: Bio11A C-MOOR Research Project
item.description: Check out this Poster I just made! In this research project I collaborated with other first semester general biology students to analyze the ways in which a Drosophila Melanogaster (aka fruit fly) could work as a potential model system for humans with Zellweger Spectrum Disorder, ZSD.

item.title: Genomics Research Project
item.description: Check out this R Notebook I just made! Check out this Poster I just made!

item.title: Tap Water Research Project
item.description: Check out this Poster I made in collaboration! In this project my team and I analyzed the concentrations of 21 different metal ions in tap water across the Clovis and Fresno California regions.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.
